mapper.insert: insert into USER (name, tel, address) values (#{name}, #{tel}, #{address})
mapper.select: select "ORDER".ID as ORDER_ID, USER.NAME as USER_NAME, GOODS.NAME as GOODS_NAME, CAST("ORDER".GOODS_PRICE * "ORDER".GOODS_NUM as decimal) as TOTAL_PRICE from "ORDER" join GOODS on GOODS.ID = "ORDER".GOODS_ID join USER on USER.ID = "ORDER".USER_ID;
